channel.title: Following = No clipping
channel.description: Does anyone here know how to fix following? Whenever you follow a player, where they walk, and the person following them, the person walks through any wall thats in their way. Does anyone know how to fix it? If you do, reply below please.

item.title: Following = No clipping
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you want good following then you will need a good walking system, look into Hyperion. The whole walking system was a big feature for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Following = No clipping
item.dc:creator: @Teem_Rocket Teem_Rocket
item.description:
@Teem_Rocket wrote:

Here’s the one Rippin was referring to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,588501.msg4173845.html#msg4173845

It’s for Project Insanity.

Read full topic

item.title: Following = No clipping
item.dc:creator: @TGMagma TGMagma
item.description:
@TGMagma wrote:

Teem_Rocket:

This is quite the lengthy fix. There are several tutorials which have been released in the past with information as to how to go about fixing this. It’s more of an implementation than a fix though. You should also make attempts to solve the problem yourself before you post.

Can you link me to a tutorial on fixing this please? I’d really appreciate it.

Read full topic
